title: Champions Loot when you have all the champios
body:
Hi Riot,

I am enjoying the new loot system with the chest and keys but could I please make one suggestion. I currently have sitting in my champions loot 9 champion shards. Now this would be exciting except for the fact that I already own all the champions. Is there some way in which the game could realise that champion shards to someone who already has all the champions is completely useless and entirely redundant. Could you please consider introducing something that would allow you to reroll them into skin shards or perhaps allow us to gift the champion shards to someone else or trade with another player? 

Best wishes

Pops

They have tried different maps and SR combinations over the years and they simply do not work, people do not take them seriously enough to work.

The only thing I can see that would work is a 4v4 SR and a 1v1 map of some sort (I have ideas, but CBF explaining).

The main issue is people not taking the game serious when anything but SR. Look at the old Dominion, TT is going the same way, players use the same dodgy tactics over and over and force others to never play them again.

Let's say you make the SR map bigger, it will only do one thing, longer games. You add another players, longer queues, games that will be over 2 minutes in, more trolls, more players who actually want to take this game as serious as a game can be and will be fucked over faster.

Imagine 6 players in team select, 4 calls on the same lane, 3 players refusing to yield, you will get nowhere. They need a new map period. The three lane idea is about 10 years old now, if not more, back from the old DoTA days.

Three lanes is how mobas work. Other games that try working away from this end up failing.

If you don't like the system of a moba, why the hell play the most popular one?
